import { useState } from 'react' import './Form.css'; const Form = () => { const [checked, setChecked] = useState({ "Action": false, "Racing / Driving": false, "Strategy": false, }) const [range, setRange] = useState([0, 99]) const print = () => { Object.keys(checked).forEach((key) => console.log(key, checked[key])) console.log(range[0], range[1]) } const toggleChecked = (genre) => { setChecked({...checked, [genre]: !checked[genre]}) } const editRange = (pos, val) => { let newArr = [...range] if(val === "") newArr[pos] = (pos === 0)? 0 : 99 else newArr[pos] = parseInt(val) setRange(newArr) } return (
Welcome to GameREC!
editRange(0, e.target.value)} />
editRange(1, e.target.value)} />
Get Recommendations!
) } export default Form;
